_docs._about: Minimal functional JSON to import an interview into the portal. Fields marked 游댮 are required, 游리 recommended, 游릭 optional.

transcript._id: 游릭 Internal transcript ID. Not critical for the pipeline.
transcript.created_at: 游릭 Transcript creation date. Informational only.
transcript.updated_at: 游릭 Last update date. Informational only.
transcript.storyId: 游리 Associated story ID. Used as a fallback if story._id does not exist.
transcript.transcript: 游릭 Full plain text transcript. Not used by the NLP processor (it is reconstructed from words).
transcript.words: 游댮 REQUIRED. Array of words with timestamps. Each word has: start (seconds, float), end (seconds, float), text (the word). Without this there is no chunking, NER, or semantic search.
transcript.paragraphs: 游댮 REQUIRED. Array of paragraphs. Each paragraph has: start (seconds), end (seconds), speaker (speaker ID, e.g. 'SPEAKER_S1'). Defines the time ranges for each speaker.
transcript.__v: 游릭 Mongoose version. Ignored by the system.

story._id: 游댮 REQUIRED. Unique interview ID. If missing, the NLP processor returns HTTP 400. Converted to UUID for Weaviate.
story.title: 游리 Interview title. Displayed in the gallery (grid/list). If missing, it will be empty.
story.description: 游리 Interview description. Shown in the UI. If missing, it will be empty.
story.duration: 游리 Duration in SECONDS (integer). Displayed as a badge on the thumbnail. If missing, it shows 0.
story.record_date: 游리 Recording date in ISO 8601 format (e.g. '2026-01-01T00:00:00.000Z'). Displayed in metadata. If missing, it shows 'No date available'.
story.transcoded: 游리 HLS streaming URL for video/audio (e.g. 'https://stream.mux.com/XXXXX.m3u8'). This is the URL used by the video player. Without it, the player will not work.
story.custom_archive_media_type: 游리 Original file MIME type (e.g. 'audio/mp3', 'audio/m4a', 'video/mp4'). If it starts with 'audio/', the UI shows a waveform icon instead of a video thumbnail. If missing, it assumes video.
story.thumbnail_url: 游릭 Custom thumbnail image URL. If missing, it is automatically generated from Mux.
story.asset_id: 游릭 External system asset ID. Stored in Weaviate but not critical.
story.organization_id: 游릭 Organization ID. Stored in Weaviate chunks.
story.project_id: 游릭 Project ID. Stored in Weaviate chunks.
story.author.full_name: 游릭 Author/publisher name. Stored as 'publisher' in Weaviate.
story.indexes: 游릭 Array of indexes/chapters. If present, multiple sections with titles and synopses are created. If missing, a SINGLE section is created containing the full transcript.

_docs.videoURL: 游리 Direct URL to the video/audio file (e.g. 'https://stream.mux.com/XXXXX/audio.m4a'). Used by the player and to extract the Mux playback ID (used to generate thumbnails). Without this, there is no functional player.
_docs.participants: 游릭 Participants array. Informational only, does not affect processing.
_docs.tags: 游릭 Tags/labels array. Informational only, does not affect processing.

transcript.transcript: Hello, this is a test interview. We are testing the minimum required fields for the portal to work correctly.

story.title: Minimum Example Interview
story.description: This is a minimal interview example.
